H0.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 10

H1.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 12

H2.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 8

H3.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 14

A4.text: Sonnets are almost all constructed using three quatrains (four-line stanzas) followed by a final couplet.

A5.text: The rhyme scheme is ABAB CDCD EFEF GG.
